entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 6:26AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Hot And Dry Over Eastern Interior This Weekend... Hot, dry and smokey conditions will occur over the Eastern Interior this weekend. High temperatures be between 80 and 90. Temperature will remain the upper 70s and lower 80s on Monday. Next week will have a cooling trend, but temperatures will still remain above normal.
